articles.title: Decoding Dark Matter: Insights From JWST's Discovery of an Einstein-Ringed Galaxy - SciTechDaily
articles.description: The James Webb Space Telescope discovered an ancient galaxy, JWST-ER1g, which exhibits a phenomenon called strong gravitational lensing, forming an Einstein ring. This galaxy, rich in dark matter, provides new insights into dark matter's properties and densit…
articles.content: JWST discovered the ancient galaxy JWST-ER1g, featuring a unique Einstein ring that aids in studying the galaxy’s high dark matter density and testing dark matter properties. Credit: Van Dokkum et al… [+3551 chars]

articles.title: Digging up new species of Australia and New Guinea's giant fossil kangaroos - Phys.org
articles.description: Paleontologists from Flinders University have described three unusual new species of giant fossil kangaroo from Australia and New Guinea, finding them more diverse in shape, range and hopping method than previously thought.

articles.title: 300 Year Old “Exceptional” Prosthesis made of Gold and Copper and wool Discovered in Poland - arkeonews
articles.description: A first-of-its-kind medical prosthesis: a nearly 300-year-old device that helped a man with cleft palate live more comfortably with this condition.
